intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blockers change to maintain day-to-day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real-world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be granted before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available.
Benchmark must run with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 using Xcode Instruments on macOS developer machine once manual execution is possible.
Time Profiler must measure render times <100 ms, Allocations instrument memory profiling <5 MB, Core Animation must verify 60 FPS on device, and findings documented in a performance report.
Publish the performance baselines for Foundation UI Phase 5.2 after CI integration with performance gates once multi‑platform testing is completed.
Build time <10s for clean build, binary size <500 KB release, memory footprint <5 MB per screen, 60 FPS on all platforms during interactions, and baseline metrics documented.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a cross‑platform report once devices and simulators are available.
Tests must cover iOS 17+ devices (iPhone SE … iPhone 15 Pro Max), iOS – iPadOS – iJSON?

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Media Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H assets into the system and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export validation.

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run a lenient‑vs‑strict performance benchmark on macOS with a 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive results in Documentation/Performance.

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish collected performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 into PERFORMANCE.md after profiling or benchmarking tasks are completed.

functional_units.name: Generate Cross‑Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Compile test results from iOS, macOS, and iPadOS devices/simulators into a cross‑platform report covering size classes, dark mode, RTL, locale, and orientation.

functional_units.name: Finalize Accessibility Sign‑off
functional_units.description: Complete manual VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, contrast, and other accessibility checks to achieve final sign‑off for the component.
